greeting.initial: Hello — this is RealtyAssistant calling about the enquiry you submitted. Am I speaking with {lead_name}?

location.ask: Which location are you searching in?
location.acknowledge: Got it, {location} is a wonderful area. Let me note that down.

property_type.ask: Are you looking for a Residential or Commercial property?

topology.residential_ask: Which BHK configuration would you prefer: 1 BHK, 2 BHK, 3 BHK, or 4 BHK?
topology.commercial_ask: What type of commercial space are you looking for: Shop, Office, or Commercial Plot?

budget.ask: What is your budget for this property?
budget.acknowledge: Thank you, I've noted your budget as {budget}.
budget.parse_failed: Could you please specify your budget as a number or range? For example, '50 lakhs' or '1-2 crore'.

consent.ask: Would you like a sales representative to call you to discuss your requirements further? (Yes/No)
consent.yes_response: Wonderful! A representative will reach out to you soon.
consent.no_response: No problem at all. We'll keep your information on file.

closing.qualified: Thanks {contact_name} — based on your inputs, we found {property_count} matching properties. We'll have a representative call you shortly to discuss the best options. Have a great day!
closing.not_qualified: Thanks for your time, {contact_name}. We'll keep you posted when properties matching your criteria become available. Have a great day!
closing.no_properties: Thanks for your time, {contact_name}. Unfortunately, we couldn't find properties matching your exact criteria right now, but we'll notify you when new listings arrive. Have a great day!

error_handling.unclear_response: I'm sorry, I didn't quite catch that. Could you please repeat?
error_handling.invalid_input: That doesn't seem quite right. Could you try again?
error_handling.connection_error: I apologize, we're experiencing some technical difficulties. Please try again later.
